import React, { useState } from 'react' import './booking.css' import { Form, FormGroup, ListGroupItem, Button, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' const Booking = ({tour, avgRating}) => { const {price, reviews} = tour const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ userId: '01', userEmail: 'example@gmail.com', fullName:'', phone:'', guestSize:1, bookAt:'' }) const handleChange = e => { setCredentials(prev=>({...prev, [e.target.id]:e.target.value})) } const serviceFee = 10 const totalAmount = Number() const handleClick = e => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(credentials) } return (

${price}/per person

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
{/* ============== booking form ============ */}
Information
{/* =================== booking end =============== */} {/* ====================== booking bottom =============== */}
${price} 1 person
${price}
Service charge
$10
Total
$109
) } export default Booking
